channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-5177] Missing drools module
item.description:
Drools module is missing in the latest version 6.3.0.DR2

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
This issue is related to ENTESB-5040.

I have added the missing jars into the rtgov layer under the modules directory. I have also tested that it works in conjunction with the integration pack - it does.
